name: Babylon Runner
description:
( TO PLAY: DOWNLOAD , UNZIP AND CLICK ON THE "BabylonRunnerProject" EXE )

Brothers and Sisters , this game is for your entertainment , a gift to let the community spirit reach new hights! What you see here , is a prototype I've worked on for the last couple days , I am by no means a professional when it comes to Unity so it was quite a fight getting it to this point , I hope that my game can entertain you in its current state!

Content:
- Endless Mode! Dodge the community's sins and drive the price of $BYY to the sun and beyond!
- coming soon?
